findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead and increases the gas consumption unnecessarily as Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0 have native functionality that replaces it.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract is using variables that initialize them only in the constructor and are not mutated by other functions, but these variables are not defined as `immutable`.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: A public function can be declared as external if it's only intended to be called from external contracts, which can help make the contract's code easier to understand and maintain, and improve performance and gas consumption.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and can also increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables configured with user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values, leading to potential problems during execution.
